name: African Daisy
description: The African Daisy is a beautiful flowering plant native to Africa.

name: African Lily
description: The African Lily is a vibrant flower species found in Africa.

name: African Marigold
description: The African Marigold is a popular garden flower known for its bright orange and yellow petals.

name: African Violet
description: The African Violet is a small, delicate flowering plant that is native to eastern Africa.

name: Amaryllis
description: The Amaryllis is a bulbous flowering plant with large, showy blooms that are native to South and Central America.

name: American Fishing Rod
description: The American Fishing Rod is a perennial flowering plant commonly found in North America.

name: American Lotus
description: The American Lotus is a water lily species native to North America.

name: Brazilian Plume
description: The Brazilian Plume is an ornamental plant known for its attractive flowers, native to Brazil.

name: Calla Lily
description: The Calla Lily is a popular flower often used in weddings and other special occasions.

name: Cockscomb
description: The Cockscomb is an annual flowering plant with unique crested flower heads resembling a rooster's comb.

name: Frangipani
description: Frangipani is a tropical flowering tree known for its fragrant and colorful blossoms.

name: Fuchsias
description: Fuchsias are flowering plants that come in a variety of vibrant colors, native to Central and South America.

name: Gloxinia
description: The Gloxinia is a tropical flowering plant cherished for its bell-shaped blooms.

name: Gooseneck Loosestrife
description: The Gooseneck Loosestrife is a perennial plant with unique curved flower spikes.

name: Hanging Lobster Claw
description: The Hanging Lobster Claw is an exotic flower with vibrant, claw-shaped blooms that hang downward.

name: Harlequin Flower
description: The Harlequin Flower is a striking plant with brightly colored, butterfly-like flowers.

name: Maximilian Sunflower
description: The Maximilian Sunflower is a tall, perennial sunflower species native to North America.

name: Speedwell
description: Speedwell is a genus of flowering plants known for their small, blue or purple flowers.

name: Spider Flower Peaches and Cream
description: The Spider Flower Peaches and Cream is a unique variety of spider flower with peach and cream-colored petals.

name: Spotted Zygopetalum
description: The Spotted Zygopetalum is an orchid species known for its beautiful spotted flowers.

name: Spring Blossom
description: Spring Blossom is a term used to describe the blooming of flowers during the spring season.

name: Tiger Flower
description: The Tiger Flower is a showy, Mexican native flower known for its tiger-like markings on the petals.

name: Water Lily
description: Water Lily is a floating aquatic plant with beautiful flowers that thrive in freshwater habitats.
